creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Wide purple and yellow warp stripes separated by narrow red stripes; designs consist of bands of bird and animal figures in green, orange, yellow and purple, separated by bands of foliage or floral zigzags, created in supplementary weft patterning. Lavender is said to be from shellfish.
dimension:
81 x 7 3/4in. (205.7 x 19.7cm) (overall)
8 1/2 in. (21.6 cm) (fringe, located at both ends)
title: Man's sash
